data.title: Permits & Inspections
data.meta_description: Permit and inspection services allow you to determine what permits you need, apply, submit plans and check your permit status.
data.text:
Get a Permit

Construction and renovation projects require different types of permits. View the City of Orlando permit guide to help you apply for a permit.

Renew, Extend, Close or Withdraw a Permit

Do you need to renew an expired permit, extend a permit that has not expired yet, request to close/withdraw an open permit, or conducting a title search?

Schedule an Appointment

You can schedule an appointment to discuss general permitting questions, process your permit or business tax receipt application, or receive assistance with the digital plan review process.

Figure Out What Permits You Need

Use our Digital Permitting guide to simplify the permitting process and to determine what permits you need for your project.

Submit Construction Project Plans

You can submit your plans online for the City of Orlando to review after your permit application has been processed. Plans are reviewed digitally.

Check Permit Status

You can use your permit number, address, project name or parcel ID to check the status of a permit in our project lookup tool.

File a Recorded Notice of Commencement

You need to submit a recorded Notice of Commencement to the City of Orlando if your permit has a contract price greater than $5,000 and you need to schedule an inspection.

Schedule or Cancel an Inspection

Different permits need inspections at different points in the project. You can schedule, reschedule or cancel inspections online via text or by phone.

Pay Permit Fees

You can view and pay any outstanding fees on a permit, request payment plans and fee exemptions.
